name: Language Practice V
description: This course is designed to hone studentsâ€™ reading, writing, listening and speaking skills through group work, written projects, oral presentations and robust engagement with authentic materials. Students will improve their communicative language competencies by participating in activities in real-world, contextual situations. By the end of FREC01H3 and FREC02H3, students will be closer to the level B2 of the Common European Framework of Reference.
